DualCreditTypeDescriptor.Description: College-taught courses taken while enrolled in high school. Students earn college academic credit and may earn simultaneous high school academic credit.

DualCreditTypeDescriptor.CodeValue: Advanced Courses Eligible for College Credit
DualCreditTypeDescriptor.ShortDescription: Advanced course eligible for college credit
DualCreditTypeDescriptor.Description: High school courses such as Advanced Placement (AP), or International Baccalaureate (IB), where students earn high school academic credit that is accepted by some colleges and universities.

DualCreditTypeDescriptor.ShortDescription: Concurrent enrollment in college courses taught in high school
DualCreditTypeDescriptor.Description: College courses taught in high school by college-approved high school teachers. Students earn college academic credit and may earn simultaneous high school academic credit.
